# PCAWG7

## Purpose

Package with data from from Alexandrov, Kim, Haradhvala, Huang et al.,
   'Repertoire of Mutational Signatures in Human Cancer'. Still a work in progress,
   so not all data from the paper are available. Contact the author of this package with
   requests.

## Installation

Install PCAWG7 from the master branch on [GitHub](https://github.com/):

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("steverozen/PCAWG7")
```
